setting_desc: Neo-Tokyo, 2077. Chrome glints under neon skies, and the air crackles with static. Megacorporations rule with iron fists, and the streets are a concrete jungle filled with augmented thugs and rogue AI. Dive into the digital underbelly, jack into the matrix, and carve your legend in the neon-drenched ruins.

areas.name: The Undercity Sewers
areas.blurb: A labyrinth of rusted pipes and toxic sludge, home to mutated vermin and desperate outcasts.

areas.name: Neo-Kyoto Markets
areas.blurb: A chaotic sprawl of crowded stalls and flickering holo-ads, where anything can be bought or sold.

areas.name: The Corporate Spire
areas.blurb: The gleaming pinnacle of corporate power, guarded by elite security forces and advanced automated defenses.

monsters.name: Mutant Rat
monsters.description: A large, diseased rat with glowing green eyes.
monsters.seen: A hulking rat with mange scurries into view.
monsters.attack: The mutant rat bites, leaving a burning sensation!
monsters.death: The mutant rat convulses and dies.

monsters.name: Scrap Golem
monsters.description: A lumbering automaton pieced together from scrap metal.
monsters.seen: A hulking figure made of discarded metal shambles towards you.
monsters.attack: The scrap golem smashes you with a metal fist!
monsters.death: The scrap golem clatters to the ground, pieces scattering.

monsters.name: Sludge Monster
monsters.description: A sentient mass of toxic waste, capable of corrosive attacks.
monsters.seen: A bubbling pile of viscous goo oozes from a drain.
monsters.attack: The sludge monster engulfs you in corrosive slime!
monsters.death: The sludge monster dissolves into a putrid puddle.

monsters.name: Cyber-Scorpion
monsters.description: A mechanical scorpion with a venomous stinger.
monsters.seen: A metallic scorpion with glowing red optics advances.
monsters.attack: The cyber-scorpion injects you with a potent neurotoxin!
monsters.death: The cyber-scorpion's mechanical limbs seize up.

monsters.name: Reaper Drone
monsters.description: A hovering military drone armed with an energy weapon.
monsters.seen: A sleek drone buzzes ominously overhead.
monsters.attack: The reaper drone fires a searing energy bolt!
monsters.death: The drone crashes to the ground in a shower of sparks.

monsters.name: Street Samurai
monsters.description: A street-level combatant with augmented reflexes and a blade.
monsters.seen: A tough-looking individual with chrome arms approaches.
monsters.attack: The street samurai slices at you with a gleaming blade!
monsters.death: The street samurai stumbles back and collapses.

monsters.name: Hacker
monsters.description: A netrunner who can disrupt your systems with mental commands.
monsters.seen: A person with glowing ocular implants stares intently at you.
monsters.attack: The hacker assaults your mind with digital static!
monsters.death: The hacker clutches their head and falls silent.

monsters.name: Yakuza Enforcer
monsters.description: A heavily augmented enforcer for the criminal underworld.
monsters.seen: A hulking figure with a cybernetic arm and tattoos glares at you.
monsters.attack: The yakuza enforcer lands a brutal punch!
monsters.death: The enforcer slumps to the ground, defeated.

monsters.name: Synth-Hound
monsters.description: A cybernetically enhanced dog trained for combat and tracking.
monsters.seen: A mechanical canine with glowing green eyes snarls.
monsters.attack: The synth-hound lunges and bites with metallic jaws!
monsters.death: The synth-hound's systems overload and fail.

monsters.name: Geisha Assassin
monsters.description: A deadly operative disguised as a traditional entertainer.
monsters.seen: A graceful figure in a kimono turns, a hidden blade glinting.
monsters.attack: The geisha assassin strikes with a poisoned dart!
monsters.death: The geisha assassin falls, her disguise shattered.

monsters.name: Security Droid
monsters.description: A standard security unit designed to patrol corporate zones.
monsters.seen: A patrol droid with a police light approaches.
monsters.attack: The security droid fires a stun blast!
monsters.death: The droid sparks and powers down.

monsters.name: Corporate Mercenary
monsters.description: A well-equipped soldier employed by the megacorps.
monsters.seen: A heavily armed mercenary blocks your path.
monsters.attack: The mercenary opens fire with their assault rifle!
monsters.death: The mercenary falls, their armor riddled with holes.

monsters.name: Tech-Priest
monsters.description: A cybernetically enhanced priest who worships technology.
monsters.seen: A robed figure with mechanical implants chanting arcane words.
monsters.attack: The tech-priest hurls a bolt of holy fire!

monsters.name: Cyber-Ninja
monsters.description: A stealthy assassin enhanced with cybernetic augmentations.
monsters.seen: A shadow detaches itself from the wall, blade in hand.
monsters.attack: The cyber-ninja strikes with lightning speed!
monsters.death: The ninja collapses, their cybernetics failing.

monsters.name: Security Chief
monsters.description: The hardened commander of a corporate security force.
monsters.seen: A stern-faced individual in advanced armor directs their troops.
monsters.attack: The chief fires a powerful energy weapon!

items.name: Reinforced Trousers
items.description: Durable pants with plating for extra protection.

items.name: Makeshift Helmet
items.description: A crude helmet fashioned from scrap metal.

items.name: Graffiti Jacket
items.description: A stylish jacket adorned with vibrant street art.

items.name: Utility Vest
items.description: A vest with many pockets for carrying essential gear.

items.name: Gloves of Dexterity
items.description: These gloves enhance your manual dexterity and grip.

items.name: Chameleon Cloak
items.description: A cloak that can partially blend with its surroundings.

items.name: Armored Kimono
items.description: A traditional kimono reinforced with light plating.

items.name: Tactical Visor
items.description: A visor that enhances your perception and targeting.

items.name: Power Gauntlets
items.description: Augmented gauntlets that increase striking power.

items.name: Datajack Boots
items.description: Boots with integrated data ports for quick access.

items.name: Ballistic Vest
items.description: A standard-issue vest offering protection against bullets.

items.name: Power Armor Helm
items.description: A heavy helmet providing significant head protection.

items.name: Reinforced Plating
items.description: Heavy plating that can be attached to existing armor.

items.name: Cybernetic Arm
items.description: A powerful robotic arm replacement.

items.name: Stealth Suit
items.description: A suit designed to minimize visibility and sound.

items.name: Pipe Wrench
items.description: A heavy wrench, useful for both repairs and blunt force.

items.name: Combat Knife
items.description: A sturdy knife designed for close-quarters combat.

items.name: Vibro-Blade
items.description: A blade that vibrates at high frequencies for enhanced cutting.

items.name: Shiv Launcher
items.description: A discreet device that fires sharp projectiles.

items.name: Makeshift SMG
items.description: A crude but effective automatic weapon.

items.name: Katana
items.description: A traditional Japanese sword, sharp and precise.

items.name: Extendable Baton
items.description: A collapsible baton used by law enforcement and security.

items.name: Shock Stick
items.description: A stick that delivers a painful electrical jolt.

items.name: Laser Pistol
items.description: A sidearm that fires concentrated beams of light.

items.name: Cyber-Revolver
items.description: A powerful handgun with enhanced cybernetic components.

items.name: Energy Sword
items.description: A blade charged with energy, capable of cutting through most materials.

items.name: Stun Baton
items.description: A baton designed to incapacitate targets with electric shocks.

items.name: Chainsaw Sword
items.description: A sword with a buzzing chainsaw blade.

items.name: Plasma Rifle
items.description: A high-tech rifle firing bolts of superheated plasma.

items.name: Railgun
items.description: A weapon that uses electromagnetic force to launch projectiles at extreme velocity.

items.name: Nutri-Paste
items.description: A bland but filling nutrient supplement.

items.name: Synth-Ration
items.description: A compact, highly processed meal replacement.

items.name: Fermented Sludge
items.description: A potent, foul-tasting drink derived from processed waste.

items.name: Synth-Sushi
items.description: Artificially created sushi, surprisingly tasty.

items.name: Ramen Pack
items.description: A quick-cooking noodle dish.

items.name: Energy Drink
items.description: A fizzy drink that temporarily boosts stamina.

items.name: Nutri-Bar
items.description: A dense bar packed with essential nutrients.

items.name: Stim-Pack
items.description: A powerful injection that temporarily enhances combat ability.

items.name: Synth-Steak
items.description: A laboratory-grown meat product, indistinguishable from the real thing.

boss.name: Cyber-Shogun
boss.description: The ruthless ruler of Neo-Kyoto, augmented with devastating cybernetics and a mastery of ancient combat techniques.
boss.intro_message: A chilling voice echoes, 'Intruder detected. Prepare for termination.'
attack_messages: A surge of electricity courses through you!
The Shogun's augmented limbs strike with blinding speed!
periodic_messages: The Cyber-Shogun's optical sensors glow menacingly.
'Your existence is a glitch,' the Shogun states emotionlessly.
The Shogun performs a swift, deadly kata.
boss.game_victory_paragraph: With the Cyber-Shogun defeated, the corporate grip on Neo-Kyoto begins to loosen. The future is uncertain, but a new dawn of freedom may be breaking.

characters.name: Jax
characters.backstory: A street-hardened cyber-runner, Jax grew up in the Undercity. Betrayed by his crew during a high-stakes data heist, he now seeks to reclaim his stolen cybernetics and exact revenge on the corporation that runs the Spire.

characters.name: Kaito
characters.backstory: A former corporate enforcer who witnessed too much corruption, Kaito abandoned his post. He now seeks to dismantle the megacorporations from the inside, using his intimate knowledge of their security systems.

characters.name: Anya
characters.backstory: A brilliant hacker with a mysterious past, Anya is searching for a legendary piece of lost technology hidden within the Corporate Spire. She believes it holds the key to unlocking true digital freedom.

characters.name: Ryu
characters.backstory: A ronin with a cybernetic arm and a burning desire for honor, Ryu was exiled from his dojo for using forbidden augmentation techniques. He wanders the neon streets, seeking worthy opponents and a chance to restore his name.

characters.name: Silas
characters.backstory: Once a respected member of a clandestine organization, Silas was framed for treason and forced into hiding. He now operates in the shadows, using his advanced cybernetics and stealth skills to uncover the conspiracy against him.
